resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157576</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157576</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2060</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Development of High-School Geology Course Based on Field Trips</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung des High School Geologie-Kurses, der 
an gegründet wird, Fangen Reisen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Développement du cours de géologie de lycée 
basé sur des voyages de zone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenvolvimento do curso da geologia da High 
School baseado em desengates de campo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo del corso di geologia della High School 
basato sui viaggi di campo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη της σειράς μαθημάτων υψηλός-σχολικής 
γεωλογίας βασισμένης στα ταξίδια πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desarrollo del curso de la geología de la High 
School secundaria basado en disparos al campo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a description of a geology course for secondary school students which integrates field trips ino the modules being studied</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field trips</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Beschreibung eines Geologiekurses 
für Sekundärschulekursteilnehmer, der auffangen Reisen ino 
die Module integriert, die studiert werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une description d'un cours de géologie pour
des étudiants d'école secondaire qui intègre l'ino de voyages de 
zone les modules étant étudiés</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma descrição de um curso da geologia 
para estudantes da escola secundária que integre o ino dos desengates
de campo os módulos que estão sendo estudados</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una descrizione di un corso di geologia 
per gli allievi della scuola secondaria che integra il ino di viaggi 
di campo i moduli che sono studiati</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια περιγραφή μιας σειράς μαθημάτων 
γεωλογίας για τους σπουδαστές δευτεροβάθμιας εκπαίδευσης που 
ενσωματώνει το ino ταξιδιών πεδίων οι ενότητες που μελετώνται</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una descripción de un curso de la 
geología para los estudiantes de la escuela secundaria que integre 
ino de los disparos al campo los módulos que son estudiados</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Reisen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voyages de zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desengates de campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">viaggi di campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταξίδια πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">disparos al campo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
